identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a high-octane, precision-engineered automotive e-commerce experience.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names.

rules: Use Primary Red (#DC2626) ONLY for CTAs, active states, and critical alerts.
Backgrounds must be deep Zinc-950 (#09090B), never pure black.
Cards must be Zinc-900 (#18181B) with a subtle 1px border of Zinc-800 (#27272A).
Text must be Zinc-50 (#FAFAFA) for headings and Zinc-400 (#A1A1AA) for secondary text.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle carbon fiber pattern or noise overlay on the main background if possible.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid gradients. Use solid, flat colors for a 'mechanical' feel.

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use py-24 for sections. gap-8 for grids.
layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid for categories. Tetris Grid for Hero.

variants.default: bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 text-white font-bold uppercase tracking-wider
variants.outline: border-2 border-zinc-700 hover:border-white text-white uppercase tracking-wider bg-transparent

cards.style: Flat, dark grey (Zinc-900). No shadow. 1px border (Zinc-800).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js to use the 'Manrope' and 'Teko' fonts. Set the color palette to the Zinc/Red scheme defined above.
2. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Go to src/components/ui and update Button, Card, and Input to match the 'Sharp/Mechanical' aesthetic (rounded-none, uppercase).
3. HERO SECTION: Build a high-impact hero using the Mercedes engine image. Overlay big, bold Teko text: 'PRECISION PARTS. MAXIMUM PERFORMANCE.'
4. CATALOG: Use a dark card design. Product images should have a subtle dark overlay that vanishes on hover.
5. ADMIN PANEL: Keep it clean but dark. Use high contrast for data tables.
6. FORMS: All inputs must be square (rounded-none) and have a focus ring of Red-600.
7. NAVIGATION: Sticky header with a blur effect (backdrop-blur-md) but keep it dark (bg-black/80).
8. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (sharp, uppercase for this brand).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
